sentence.text: The Rb tumor suppressor gene performs a critical role in controlling cell proliferation and tumorigenesis; it recruits negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II protein into the E2F complexes to repress transcription.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In this study, we demonstrate that production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA, RB and negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II were significantly expressed in same lung cancer tissues in a tissue microarray (TMA) containing 300 non-small cell lung cancers (NSCLC).

entity.text: production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: High expression level of production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA in tumor patients was significantly correlated with poor prognosis in NSCLC (log-rank P for OS = 0.01, log-rank P for DFS = 0.001).

entity.text: production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA

sentence.text: Knockdown of production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA reduced colony formation ability of lung cancer cells.

entity.text: production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA

sentence.text: These findings may indicate the involvement of production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA in progression of lung cancer by regulating the RB/negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II interaction

entity.text: production of miRNAs involved in gene silencing by miRNA
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
